home.title: I am Everson Soucek
home.subtitle: Web Developer
home.description: Software Engineer focused on web development, with experience in React and C#.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.workDescription: Software Engineering student in the 6th semester, working as a QA analyst in an ERP system, involved in exploratory testing and documentation of new software features.
aboutMe.studyDescription: Interests in automated testing with Robot Framework in Python and Fullstack development with MERN Stack.

experiences.title: Experiences
experiences.qaDescription: Working as a QA analyst in an ERP system, involved in exploratory testing, creating test cases, and documenting new software features.
experiences.contractSystem: Developed a system to automate contract generation in the sales department. For more details, refer to the projects section.

projects.title: Projects
projects.contractGeneratorDescription: I developed an automated system for contract generation in the Siemens Gamesa sales department, replacing a manual process. The solution generates personalized PDF contracts, automatically adapting information such as address, date, and currency type for different clients. The system also includes strict validations to ensure data accuracy.
